bio.title: Pragmatic Developer. Fast Learner. Impact Driven.
bio.p1: I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer with over 3 years of professional experience building production systems at fintech companies. I've worked extensively with Kotlin and Vert.x on the backend, and React with TypeScript on the frontend.
bio.p2: My expertise lies in fraud prevention systems, microservices architecture, and building tools that handle real-world scale. I'm passionate about clean code, test-driven development, and shipping features that users actually need.
bio.p3: Beyond the day job, I love experimenting with new tech, contributing to open source, and staying on the cutting edge of software engineering. Always learning, always building.
